content.rendered:
Ashram Events

Ashram Regular Events ♦ Ashram Retreat Events ♦ Ashram Events Calendar

The Gopinath Bhakti Ashram has many auspicious moments, which are joyful and memorable. To join any of these moments, please see the following events below:

Ashram Regular Events

(Types of gathering and joy)

Srimad Bhagawat Katha Week

Vishnu Puran Week

Temple Pilgrimages Tour:

  • Temples of Krishna, Radha-Krishna, and Avatars of Vishnu

Krishna’s Scriptures and Literature

Ashram Retreat Events

Guru Purnima

New Years Retreat

Akhand Kirtan Gathering

Akhand Kirtan

Group Mantra (Japa) Meditation

Retreat Events

Mantra (Japa) Meditation

Ashram Events Calendar 2016
